thread.section_title: Hotel Residence des Arts - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excelent stay
thread.title_full: Excelent stay - Review of Hotel Residence des Arts, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Luis Z
title: Excelent stay
text:
I stayed in the junior suite and it is bigger than a lot of parisian apartments that i know. The staff is very helpful. The location of the hotel is perfect. Very close to all the restaurants and stores in St Germain, but also very close to the Seine and all the main touristic attractions in Paris.
Room Tip: The junior suite is very big for a hotel room in paris. It is actually bigger than a lot of parisian... See more room tips
